overview:
Pradyot Sahu is an Innovator and Speaker in Innovation and Technology and creator of Innovation Engineering a NEW discipline of Innovation and Engineering.

PROFESSIONAL ACTIVITIES -Senior Member of IEEE, IEEE Computer Society, Member of Association of Computing Machinery and Internet Society. -Speaker, IEEE India National Distinguished Lecturer Program, NDLP

  • Mentor of MentorEdge of IIM Ahmedabad’s Centre for Innovation Incubation and Entrepreneurship (CIIE). -Mentor in IEEE Mentoring Connection Program and Mentor Net through ACM -International Innovation Award at Innovation Exchange for a Platform Innovation in a Global major company present in 180 countries in Food and Beverages Industry in 2009. -Technical Program Committee Member and Paper Reviewer of IEEE International Conference on Management of Innovation and Technology ICMIT-2010 held in Singapore and ICMIT-2008 held in Bangkok, Thailand -Paper Reviewer of IEEE International Technology Management Conference ITMC-2011 to be held in San Jose, CA, USA. -Paper Reviewer of IEEE International Engineering Management Conferences; IEMC China-2008 held in Beijing, China, IEMC-2006 held in Brazil, IEMC-2005 held in Canada -Judge of IEEE Computer Society Web Programming Competition (CHC61) 2007. -Interim Report Evaluator and Submission Evaluation Team Member of IEEE Computer Society International Design Competition, CSIDC-2005 and CSIDC-2004.

Visual Arts:- -Paint modern abstract arts in acrylic and digital medium. -Work on artistic photography and video including non-fiction and non-profit sector. -Work on theories of abstraction and transformation in Visual Arts and Innovation including Philosophical Abstractionism in modern art.

Specialties Innovation, Innovation Engineering, Innovation Management, Technology, Product, Service and Social Innovation
